        For REST API

      • close

        public void close()
           throws InterruptedException
        Closes the processor. If flushing by time is enabled, then it is shut down. Any remaining ingest actions are flushed.
        Throws:
        InterruptedException

      • flush

        public void flush()
        Flush this processor, write all requests

      • waitForResponses

        public boolean waitForResponses(org.elasticsearch.common.unit.TimeValue maxWait)
                         throws InterruptedException
        Wait for responses of outstanding requests.
        Returns:
        true if all requests answered within the waiting time, false if not
        Throws:
        InterruptedException
